description:
A cozy mummy style bag for the side sleepers among us. The Sidewinder's innovative cocoon pattern offers a great night’s sleep. The SL version uses a body-mapped blend of down and synthetic insulation to add extra coziness. Synthetic insulation at the hips and foot box reduces common cold spots for side sleepers. The blanket-like hood has hand pockets in the corners, so you can tuck yourself in just like you do at home.

  • Shell is nylon, lining is soft polyester microfiber, both have a water-repellent finish
  • 650 fill-power DownTek™ uses Bluesign™ approved chemistry for water-repellency, has antimicrobial and antibacterial protection
  • Sourced under the Responsible Down Standard
  • FireLine™ Eco insulation uses 100% post-consumer recycled polyester. Durable, low denier fibres are tightly woven to provide high-loft, compressibility, a high weight-to-warmth ratio
  • Cocoon design holds insulation close to the body
  • Horizontal baffles create tunnels of warmth around your body and prevent insulation from shifting and creating cold spots
  • Anti-snag locking zipper operates ambidextrously
  • Draft flap behind zip ensures cold air doesn't sneak in
  • Optimized footbox mimics the natural position of your feet when lying on your side
  • Hood lets you lift and move your head, even when fully zipped up and has a one-handed cinch adjustment
  • Stretch-mesh pillow pocket keeps your pillow right where you want it
  • Hang loops let you air it out in the sun
  • Includes a mesh storage bag and a nylon stuff sack
name: Big Agnes Sidewinder SL -7C Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
